column4: Hi! Why do I often experience that files that I can play with mplayer, cant be played with totem, even though ffmpeg is installed? (totem-gstreamer and gstreamer-ffmpeg is installed...)
are these wmv files perhaps?
nope, mpeg4
totem-xine can use it
gstreamer cannot handle mpeg4 I guess
but the gstreamer-ffmpeg package claims that it does :)... But, no need to bother you anymore, I
thanks
why would there be?
cause I need the header files :)
checking for XScreenSaverQueryInfo in -lXext... no :(
any ideas?
find libxext-dev then :)
do you happen to know the name of the headerfile?
hmm, that might be something. thanks scrnsaver.h
libxss-dev
awesome! Thanks! Been searching for xscreensaver, but that didn't return that package :)
thank apt-file, it found it for me :)
hmmm... :-S, never used that... Learn something every day. Maybe the file search option should be in synaptic (then I would have found it :) )
it shouldn't
but it could have been a plugin :
ghe, that makes it even easier :)
is it possible to remove lvm, raid and evm from boot?
